changes.description:
Added support for checking backwards compatibility for diffs of trait
contents.
Added support for adding CORS configurations to API Gateway HTTP APIs.

Relaxed constraints on the `@httpPayload` trait, allowing it to target `list`,
`set`, and `map` shapes except in AWS protocols.

Added validation to ensure a `payloadFormatVersion` is set when generating an
API Gateway HTTP API.

Added `vendorParamsShape` to protocol test cases to support validating a test
case's `vendorParams` values are configured properly.
Added the ability to validate resolved hosts to protocol tests.

Added backwards compatibility checking to `smithy-diff` for the `@paginated`
trait.

Added `tags` and `appliesTo` to protocol test definitions for better
categorization and grouping.
Added several protocol tests for the `endpoint` and `hostLabel` traits.
Added several `@restXml` protocol tests.

Added a configuration definition for use validating `vendorParams` in AWS
protocol tests.
Added tests and documentation for some required Amazon S3 customizations.
Added tests and documentation for required Amazon Glacier customizations.

Added a test and documentation for the required Amazon API Gateway
customization.

Added a test and documentation for the required Amazon Machine Learning
customization.

Fixed an issue that produced duplicate entries in the `security` list of a
converted OpenAPI document.

Fixed an issue where `alphanumericOnlyRefs` was not fully satisfied when
generating synthesized shapes.

Fixed several issues in IDL parsing where duplicate bindings were allowed
incorrectly.
Fixed several issues in protocol tests around serialization of empty contents.
Fixed an issue where parameters in a diff error message were swapped.
Fixed an issue in a `restXml` protocol test.
Improved the documentation for the `awsJson1_0` and `awsJson1_1` protocols.
Improved the documentation for the `awsQuery` and `ec2Query` protocols.

Clarified that Smithy requires support for fractional seconds for the
`http-date` value of `@timestampFormat`.
Added missing shape documentation for some waiters related shapes.
Fixed several minor documentation issues.

Migrated to using Gradle 6 to build Smithy. This should have no impactful
downstream effects.

Migrated to using `main` from `master` for the default branch. This should
have no impactful downstream effects.
